languages.text: После странствий с Вольным Торговцем Кассия Орселлио вернулась в лоно Дома, где приближенные и великий регент провозгласили ее новым Новатором. Привыкшая во всем полагаться на Лорд-капитана, Кассия стала послушным инструментом династии фон Валанциус и направила все силы Дома на помощь свое{mf|му|й} {mf|другу|подруге} и наставни{mf|ку|це}... Даже тогда, когда это вредило интересам Орселлио.

After her travels with the Rogue Trader, Cassia Orsellio returned to the bosom of her house, where her circle and the Great Regent declared her the new Novator. Accustomed to relying on the Lord Captain for everything, Cassia became an obedient servant of the von Valancius dynasty, making every effort to help her friend and mentor. Even when doing so harmed the interests of House Orsellio.
languages.original_text: После странствий с Вольным Торговцем Кассия Орселлио вернулась в лоно Дома, где приближенные и великий регент провозгласили ее новым Новатором. Привыкшая во всем полагаться на Лорд-капитана, Кассия стала послушным инструментом династии фон Валанциус и направила все силы Дома на помощь свое{mf|му|й} {mf|другу|подруге} и наставни{mf|ку|це}... Даже тогда, когда это вредило интересам Орселлио.

traits.locale_text: After her travels with the Rogue Trader, Cassia Orsellio returned to the bosom of her House, where the close circle and the Great Regent declared her the new Novator. Used to rely on the Lord Captain in everything, Cassia became an obedient instrument for the von Valancius dynasty and put all her effort into helping her friend and mentor. Even when it damaged the interests of Orsellio.

After her travels with the Rogue Trader, Cassia Orsellio returned to the bosom of her House, where the close circle and the Great Regent declared her the new Novator. Used to rely on the Lord Captain in everything, Cassia became an obedient instrument for the von Valancius dynasty and put all her effort into helping her friend and mentor. Even when it damaged the interests of Orsellio.

Used to relying on the Lord Captain for everything, Cassia became an obedient servant of the von Valancius dynasty, making every effort to help her friend and mentor. Even when doing so hurt the interests of House Orsellio.

Used to relying on the Lord Captain for everything, Cassia became an obedient servant of the von Valancius dynasty, making every effort to help her friend and mentor. Even when doing so hurt the interests of House Orsellio.

Accustomed to relying on the Lord Captain for everything, Cassia became an obedient servant of the von Valancius dynasty, making every effort to help her friend and mentor. Even when doing so harmed the interests of House Orsellio.

After her travels with the Rogue Trader, Cassia Orsellio returned to the bosom of her house, where her circle and the Great Regent declared her the new Novator. Accustomed to relying on the Lord Captain for everything, Cassia became an obedient servant of the von Valancius dynasty, making every effort to help her friend and mentor. Even when doing so harmed the interests of House Orsellio.

languages.text: 结束了与行商浪人的旅行之后，卡西娅·奥赛罗回到了家族的怀抱。在家族议会上，大摄政王宣布她为新的大族长。由于卡西娅习惯于事事依赖行商浪人，因此她成了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的温顺仆人，唯行商浪人马首是瞻，尽她所能地协助她的朋友与导师，哪怕会损害奥赛罗家族的利益也不在意。
languages.original_text: After her travels with the Rogue Trader, Cassia Orsellio returned to the bosom of her house, where her circle and the Great Regent declared her the new Novator. Accustomed to relying on the Lord Captain for everything, Cassia became an obedient servant of the von Valancius dynasty, making every effort to help her friend and mentor. Even when doing so harmed the interests of House Orsellio.

traits.locale_text: 结束了与行商浪人的旅行之后，卡西娅·奥塞罗回到了家族的怀抱。在家族议会上，大摄政王宣布她为新的大族长。由于卡西娅习惯于事事依赖行商浪人，因此她成了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的温顺仆人，唯行商浪人马首是瞻，尽她所能地协助她的朋友与导师，哪怕会损害奥塞罗家族的利益也不在意。

languages.text: Nach ihren Reisen mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} kehrte Cassia Orsellio in den Schoß ihres Hauses zurück, wo ihr Zirkel und der Große Regent sie zur neuen Novatorin ernannten. Cassia hatte sich daran gewöhnt, in allen Dingen auf den Lord Captain angewiesen zu sein. Sie wurde zu einer gehorsamen Dienerin der Dynastie derer von Valancius und tat alles, um {mf|ihrem Freund und Mentor|ihrer Freundin und Mentorin} zu helfen. Selbst, wenn sie damit den Interessen des Hauses Orsellio schadete.
languages.original_text: After her travels with the Rogue Trader, Cassia Orsellio returned to the bosom of her house, where her circle and the Great Regent declared her the new Novator. Accustomed to relying on the Lord Captain for everything, Cassia became an obedient servant of the von Valancius dynasty, making every effort to help her friend and mentor. Even when doing so harmed the interests of House Orsellio.

traits.locale_text: Nach ihren Reisen mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} kehrte Cassia Orsellio in den Schoß ihres Hauses zurück, wo ihr Zirkel und der Große Regent sie zur neuen Novatorin ernannten. Cassia hatte sich daran gewöhnt, in allen Dingen auf den Lord Captain angewiesen zu sein. Sie wurde zu einer gehorsamen Dienerin der Dynastie derer von Valancius und tat alles, um {mf|ihrem Freund und Mentor|ihrer Freundin und Mentorin} zu helfen. Selbst, wenn sie damit den Interessen des Hauses Orsellio schadete.

languages.text: Après avoir voyagé aux côtés {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, Cassia Orsellio retourna dans le giron de sa maison où son cercle et le vénérable régent firent d'elle la nouvelle Novator. Habituée à dépendre {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, Cassia devint une fidèle servante de la dynastie von Valancius et fit tout son possible pour aider son {mf|ami|amie} et mentor, même lorsque cela desservait les intérêts de la maison Orsellio.
languages.original_text: After her travels with the Rogue Trader, Cassia Orsellio returned to the bosom of her house, where her circle and the Great Regent declared her the new Novator. Accustomed to relying on the Lord Captain for everything, Cassia became an obedient servant of the von Valancius dynasty, making every effort to help her friend and mentor. Even when doing so harmed the interests of House Orsellio.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir voyagé aux côtés {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, Cassia Orsellio retourna dans le giron de sa maison où son cercle et le vénérable régent firent d'elle la nouvelle Novator. Habituée à dépendre {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, Cassia devint une fidèle servante de la dynastie von Valancius et fit tout son possible pour aider son {mf|ami|amie} et mentor, même lorsque cela desservait les intérêts de la maison Orsellio.

languages.text: Cuando sus viajes con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente llegaron a su fin, Cassia Orsellio volvió al corazón de su casa, donde su círculo y el gran regente la coronaron como nueva Novator. Habituada a confiar en {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán para todo, Cassia se convirtió en una sirviente fiel de la dinastía von Valancius, y dedicó todos sus esfuerzos a ayudar a su amig{mf|o|a} y mentor{mf||a}... incluso cuando hacerlo iba en contra de los intereses de la casa Orsellio.
languages.original_text: After her travels with the Rogue Trader, Cassia Orsellio returned to the bosom of her house, where her circle and the Great Regent declared her the new Novator. Accustomed to relying on the Lord Captain for everything, Cassia became an obedient servant of the von Valancius dynasty, making every effort to help her friend and mentor. Even when doing so harmed the interests of House Orsellio.

traits.locale_text: Cuando sus viajes con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente llegaron a su fin, Cassia Orsellio volvió al corazón de su casa, donde su círculo y el gran regente la coronaron como nueva Novator. Habituada a confiar en {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán para todo, Cassia se convirtió en una sirviente fiel de la dinastía von Valancius, y dedicó todos sus esfuerzos a ayudar a su amig{mf|o|a} y mentor{mf||a}... incluso cuando hacerlo iba en contra de los intereses de la casa Orsellio.

languages.text: 自由開拓者との旅を終え、憩いの住み処に帰り着いたカシア・オーセリオは、周囲の人々とグレート・リージェントによって新たなノベイターとして任命することを宣言された。あらゆる物事についてロード・キャプテンに頼ることに慣れていたカシアは、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の従順な奉仕者となり、友や庇護者の助けとなるべく力を尽くした。たとえそうすることが、オーセリオ家の利益を損なうことになったとしても。
languages.original_text: After her travels with the Rogue Trader, Cassia Orsellio returned to the bosom of her house, where her circle and the Great Regent declared her the new Novator. Accustomed to relying on the Lord Captain for everything, Cassia became an obedient servant of the von Valancius dynasty, making every effort to help her friend and mentor. Even when doing so harmed the interests of House Orsellio.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者との旅を終え、憩いの住み処に帰り着いたカシア・オーセリオは、周囲の人々とグレート・リージェントによって新たなノベイターとして任命することを宣言された。あらゆる物事についてロード・キャプテンに頼ることに慣れていたカシアは、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の従順な奉仕者となり、友や庇護者の助けとなるべく力を尽くした。たとえそうすることが、オーセリオ家の利益を損なうことになったとしても。

languages.text: Cassia Orsellio, Hür Tacir'le yaptığı yolculuklar sonrasında hanesinin bağrına geri döndü. Yakın çevresi ve Yüce Naip, onu yeni Rota Reisi ilan etti. Her konuda Lord Kaptan'a bel bağlamaya alışık olan Cassia, von Valancius hanedanlığının itaatkâr bir hizmetkârı olup dostuna ve yönderine yardımcı olabilmek için elinden geleni yaptı. Yaptıkları, Orsellio Hanesi'nin çıkarlarına ters düşse bile bu ülküden şaşmadı.
languages.original_text: After her travels with the Rogue Trader, Cassia Orsellio returned to the bosom of her house, where her circle and the Great Regent declared her the new Novator. Accustomed to relying on the Lord Captain for everything, Cassia became an obedient servant of the von Valancius dynasty, making every effort to help her friend and mentor. Even when doing so harmed the interests of House Orsellio.

traits.locale_text: Cassia Orsellio, Hür Tacir'le yaptığı yolculukların sonrasında hanesinin bağrına geri döndü. Burada çevresindekiler ve Yüce Naip onu yeni Rota Reisi ilan etti. Her konuda Lord Kaptan'a bel bağlamaya alışık olan Cassia, von Valancius hanedanlığının itaatkâr bir hizmetkârı oldu ve dostu ve yönderine yardımcı olabilmek için elinden geleni yaptı. Yaptıkları, Orsellio Hanesi'nin çıkarlarına ters düşse bile.
